artist: Designer: William Morris; Author: Jacobus de Voragine; Translator: William Caxton; Publisher: Kelmscott Press, Hammersmith, England
catalogue_raissonne: Clark Library, Kelmscott and Doves, pp. 17-18; Peterson A7; Ransom, Private Presses, p. 325, no. 7; Sparling 7. Tomkinson, p. 109, no. 7
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Kemper Kirkpatrick
description: Single letterpress leaf (pp. 33-34) from the Kelmscott Press book The Golden Legend; printed in Golden type designed by Morris.
medium: Letterpress with woodcut initials on double-sided leaf
provenance: (James and Mary Laurie Booksellers, St. Paul, sold to Kirkpatrick, 5/08/82); Kemper E. Kirkpatrick, St. Paul; Estate of Kemper E. Kirkpatrick, St. Paul; given to MIA, 1992.
title: Leaf from "The Golden Legend: the Golden Legend of Master William Caxton done anew"
